Can anyone upload a smaller size of this?
19.2gigs would surely take a month or so for me to finish, our connection speed at max. is 160kb/s assuming it's always running at that speed. Maybe a DVD below 2gigs or a Blu-Ray below 5gigs would surely be appreciated by slow internet connection people like me. Anyways I'm still grateful that someone uploaded this as early as now, people w/ fast connection speed would surely be thankful, lastly to those who read this and already downloaded the movie if possible please upload a smaller size movie for us poor bastards.

Poor bastards indeed.

Immensely grateful to you for posting this, I've been searching the internet like a zombie for the past few days.

Though I'm a bit worried that I've been connecting only to peers, out of the ninety-something seeds that are shown theres no single connection. It's downloading pretty fast right now, hope it doesn't just stop abruptly, that the seeds are just at their connection limit right now.

Anyway, once again, thanks a lot.

@Faulknen - Man you could be our hero! I'm begging if you have the time after you finish downloading it, please convert it to a smaller output then upload it on TPB. From Feb. 4, I started searching for this release day after day till I heard that the DVD/Blu-Ray release date is on Mar. 23 so I waited again then when that day came I sought for it up to Mar. 26 when suddenly someone linked this from SuprBay! Days of so much regret disappeared in an instant however a few seconds past it reappeared...Why? Cause of the size! Please man as I've said my max download speed is 160kb/s, it would take a month or 2 and I'm very sure I'm not the only one who's suffering here, this is driving me nuts so please end our sorrow. :(

To clarify, there is only one seed at the moment, despite TPB saying like 10 and your torrent client saying zero. The one seed is the original uploader, and those of us leeching since the word go are at approximately 40%. This will most likely take another 20 or so hours due to the poor uploading speed of the original uploader, however IT IS LEGIT, and he has assured us that he will continue seeding.
As a rough estimate, it looks like about 20% every 12 hours. We're currently at about 40%. So that leaves 36 hours to go.
So at 40% I was able to look through some of the mkv and see a large chunk of the beginning of the movie... including the subtitles. Who wants to be a baller and translate while we wait?

Berserk is memorable because of its plot and character development. I don't think most fans are going to be concerned about the animation quality especially after seeing the TV series.

@Faulknen - Thanks for assuring us man, now I know that, I felt so much relief, all of you people here in TPB are what the world needs. Some people like me just can't afford, in our country corrupt government -> poor economy -> low exchange rate 1 dollar = 43.8 and the price of the movie is about 70 dollars = 3,070 would take  a min. of 3 months for me to save, I'm still 17 so I'm still attending school.
@Daman4Iife - Thanks for your FMA: Sacred Star of Milos, Rurouni Kenshin New Kyoto Arc and concerning the animation, Rurouni Kenshin has no 3D CGI as I recall but the film/OVA is only 45mins, fans aren't that satisfied. There are Berserk fans out there for about 20yrs and most of them waited for a decade for it to see a new light, what matters most IMHO is if it sticks true to the canon matter and won't avoid major events like the first anime series though I don't like the implementation of CG, I've been a fan of the manga for 5 months only, I just can't get enough of it.
